modName: Draugr Skirts UNP UNPB CBBE and BBP Variants
summary: WARNING: Contains see through outfits so adults only. I formed the rags that the female Draugrs have on in the dungeons to fit UNP, UNPB, CBBE & each of the BBP variants for people that use BBP. I also added a few different textures to it as well.
descriptionHtml:
Name          : Draugr Skirts UNP+BBP, UNPB+BBP & CBBE+BBP
Version       : 1.0
Date          : 12-09-12  
Category      : Armour
Author(s)     : Tattooedillusions
-------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------

EDIT: Fixed files are up...I hope.  If I\'ve missed yet another one PLEASE let me know so I can get that fixed too.  I moved the esp only file in the optional files now just in case I missed one


Description:
------------
WARNING: Contains see through outfits so adults only. I formed the rags that the female Draugrs have on in the dungeons to fit UNP, UNPB, CBBE & each of the BBP variants for people that use BBP. I also added a few different textures to it as well.


Detail:
-------

VERY IMPORTANT SO PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING BEFORE DOWNLOADING:

If you choose to use the BBP versions of either UNP, UNPB or CBBE you will need the proper skeleton and animations for these to work. If you DON\'T have them it MAY CAUSE CRASHING. You can grab the original BBP skeleton and animations from Cherryhotaling\'s mod CHSBHC-BBP-Nude and Jiggly Mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888). If you want to view the jiggle from the front view of your character as you walk you will need an additional animation replacer such as Victoria\'s High Heel Walk Animation by xp32 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13272). I personally use the Less Exaggerated version. Another skeleton that is compatible is xp32\'s Maximum Skeleton-XPMS (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800/). Read his description page for more info because you will need FNIS more than likely.

Also, I got this a few times with the original Litheria version \"that\'s not a skirt it\'s a dress\". Technically the vanilla version are rags but I didn\'t want to name it rags because the other textures don\'t remind me of rags and this \"dress\" is barely there so I called it a skirt. 

Ok now on to what this is. For one this is my second Skyrim mod. It is somewhat of an expansion on my first mod for Humannature66 & GinnyFizz\'s the Litheria Race, Body & Armor mod. That mod can be found here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26614. That mod is just the outfit with no body included so you will need HN66\'s mod found here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25461 in order for it to work. Needless to say I need to find a \"Texturing for Dummies\" book soon so please go easy on my  lack of talent. If you find that you like it, awesome and thank you. If you think it sucks, you\'re not alone but don\'t rub my face in it and just look for something you do like please.

What I did was I took the dirty, silky-ish skirt/rags that the female Draugrs wear in their dungeons and formed it to the UNP, UNPB & CBBE bodies along with each one\'s BBP Variant. The CBBE version is a custom bodyslide preset of the new 3.2 version that I made to be very similar to a preset that Ginnyfizz sent me. Another note on the CBBE version is that the outfits themselves ARE NOT bodyslide compatible meaning if you have you\'re own personal preset it will not be the same size. I may look into this in the future but for right now it is what it is. If someone that knows how to do this feel free to do so and teach me in the process lol. All I ask is if you do make it compatible just let me know so I can check it out and include myself and the other great modders in my credits list. There is the original texture, 3 leather textures, 4 lace textures and a chainmail texture right now. With better knowledge of what I\'m doing I would like to do more at a later time but right now this is what I\'ve got. So you start a new game and decide you don\'t want those prison outfits much longer and want something that\'s barely there. It\'s not much but when you enter Helgen Keep after you decide which faction to go with there will be a barrel in the room that both sides first encounter each other. If you side with the Stormcloaks I believe it is the very first room you enter.  If you side with the Imperials it should be the 2nd. In that barrel you can slip into something a bit more comfortable by grabbing an original texture Draugr skirt. The other textures are in 2 different dungeon areas. Probably your first (chainmail & leathers) will be deep in Bleak Falls Barrow when you retrieve the Dragonstone. It\'s in a chest in the same area as where you learn your first Shout right against the Shout Wall to the right. The other (lace) is in Potema\'s Sanctum a little before you enter the room full of her minions. You will enter a room that has a table on the left with a draugr body laying on it with some other things. When you enter that room immediately look to the right inside the doorway for the chest. Check the pictures for locations. Hopefully more to come later.  

Enjoy and if you like it please endorse, leave a comment or submit a picture (I have it set so I have to verify just so I know when someone does decide to send one) or if you\'re feeling really generous all 3 would be awesome ha ha. And PLEASE don\'t forget to do the same for Dimon99\'s UNP body, AjuntaPall316\'s BBP version of UNP, Calyps for the UNPB body, Caliente for the CBBE body and bodyslide and Cherry for the basis for BBP with the skeleton and animations. They are the one\'s that really deserve it.

Cheers!
TI

Followers used in photos:

My own tweaked version of Aela the Huntress

FalmerBane\'s version of Camilla Valerius
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14368

Natilde\'s standalone CBBE companion Juliette
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25608

gilgoon\'s standalone CBBE companion Ria
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17354


---Installation:---
-------------------
Manual Installation:
--------------------
IMPORTANT PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING
In order for the outfits to work as intended, you MUST:

(THIS STEP IS ONLY NECESSARY IF YOU ARE USING A BBP VARIANT. IF NOT THEN SKIP TO THE NEXT STEP)

FIRST download and install Cherry\'s skeleton & animations.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888

OR

xp32\'s Maximum skeleton along with his requirement (FNIS) (Note you will still need Cherry\'s animations too.)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800/

(MAIN STEP)

SECOND download and install the body replacer of your choice if you haven\'t already and make sure you have the correct body textures for that body.

Dimon99\'s UNP Body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

AjuntaPall316\'s BBP version of Dimon\'s UNP body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10470

Calyps\' UNPB body (MY PERSONAL FAVORITE)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899

Caliente\'s CBBE body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

THIRD extract the file you just downloaded from here to anywhere you want to on your computer.

FOURTH copy the data folder in the file you just downloaded to your Skyrim game directory which should be C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim.

FOURTH make sure the DraugrSkirt.esp is ticked in either your mod manager or your launcher and enjoy.


---Uninstallation:---
---------------------
Manual Uninstallation:
----------------------
Untick the .esp file in the mod manager or launcher and delete it and the files that came with this mod.


Known issues and bugs:
----------------------
Maybe a little clipping. Especially with the UNPB BBP version around the breasts at idle. I will try to fix this eventually but I\'ve been working on this for along time and just want to get it out. Also, on the right hip you will notice some triangles. That is how the original Beth mesh was and my noobness has no idea to fix it. Another thing I have no idea how to fix is you\'ll notice that when inside somewhere some of the outfits (lighter ones especially) will look darker when the light hits it. I have no idea if this is a nif setting I have to change or if it\'s just Skyrim\'s lighting. Any advice would be great on that matter.


Incompatabilities:
------------------
None that I know of just make sure you have the right body textures installed for the body you are using.


Contact:
--------
Feel free to send me a message here at the Nexus if you run into any issues or just to say Hey.


IMPORTANT - Requirements:
-------------------------
Skyrim of course

A body replacer from one of the above links

(Only necessary if you are using BBP)
CherryHotaling\'s BBP skeleton and animations or your game will crash


Credits:
--------
Dimon99 for the UNP body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

AjuntaPall316 for the BBP version of the UNP body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10470

Calyps for the UNPB & BBP body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899

Caliente for the CBBE body and Bodyslide
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

CherryHotaling for bringing the bounce to Skyrim in the first place
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888

xp32 for the XPMS Maximum Skeleton
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800

and for the Victoria\'s High Heeled Walk animations
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13272

Humannature66 for his great input and thoughts on the Litheria Draugr Skirts. Also for some of the other goodies he\'s brought to Skyrim.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1341839

Ginnyfizz for her input and ideas (Helgen) on the Litheria Draugr Skirts version also. And for the basis on my CBBE Bodyslide preset that I used.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/196909

Kendo 2 for some nifskope tips he\'s given me and the sweet NV comics and all the awesome clothing/armors past and present.  You can check all those out at his user page.
http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/users/282595

Jonas66 for the blender tips and his amazing tutorials on Blender, Nifskope, Screenshots, etc.  Check out those if you\'re interested in starting Blender along with his other great clothing mods.
http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/users/241581

Nightasy for all of the amazing video tutorials he has done for modding Skyrim including a couple that covered some CK questions I didn\'t know the answers to.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3076419

Nifskope

Bethesda for creating the Fallout & Elder Scrolls series and allowing us to mod these games

And everyone else that is among the credits of each of the people listed above!

If I\'ve left anyone out at all please don\'t hunt me down just yet.  PM me and I will gladly add you!

Legal and licensing:
--------------------
If you can make these look great then go for it but please at least include myself and the talented modders I\'ve listed in your credits. Also just drop a line to me to let me know what your plans are so I can check out what you\'ve done with them. Oh and teach me while you\'re at it ha ha.
author: Tattooedillusions
